<script>

var _loc = decodeURI(window.location + '');
_loc = _loc.replace(/%40/g, '@');

var regexps = [/\b[A-Za-z0-9_\-\.]+\@[A-Za-z0-9_\-\.]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,5}\b/g, /@/g, /\bgmail\b/ig, /\bhotmail\b/ig, /\byahoo\b/ig, /\b\.com\b/ig];
var _loc_replaced = false;

for(var i in regexps) {
	if (regexps[i].test(_loc)) {
		_loc_replaced = true;
		_loc = _loc.replace(regexps[i], '');
	}
}

if (_loc_replaced) {
	_loc = _loc.replace(/\s+/g, ' ');
	_loc = _loc.replace(/\s+$/g, '');
	_loc = _loc.replace(/^\s+/g, '');
	window.history.pushState(null, null, _loc);
}

  (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

  ga('create', 'UA-33801202-1', 'auto');

// Optimizely Universal Analytics Integration
window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
window.optimizely.push("activateUniversalAnalytics");

 	var tmpSource = window.location.search.match(/(\?|&)utm_source\=([^&]*)/);
	var tmpContent = window.location.search.match(/(\?|&)utm_content\=([^&]*)/);
	var tmpCustom = window.location.search.match(/(\?|&)custom\=([^&]*)/);
	var utm_source = (tmpSource ? tmpSource[2] : '');
	var utm_content = (tmpContent ? tmpContent[2] : '');
	var customparam = (tmpCustom ? tmpCustom[2] : '');
	if ((utm_source == 'Alerts' || customparam == 'conversion') && utm_content != '') {
		ga('set', '&uid', utm_content);	
	}

if (window.jam_kw) {
	ga('set', 'dimension1', window.jam_kw);
}

if (window.jam_page) {
	ga('set', 'dimension2', window.jam_page);
}

}

<script type="text/javascript">
function GAEventCaller() {
	this.gaEvent = function(category, action, label, value, callback) {
		if (typeof ga !== 'undefined') {
			ga('send', 'event', {
				'eventCategory': category,
				'eventAction': action,
				'eventLabel': label,
				'eventValue': value,
				'hitCallback': function() {
					if (callback) {
						callback.call(window);
					}
				}
			});
		}
	};
	
	this.alert = function(action, label, callback) {
		this.gaEvent('Alerts', action, label, null, callback);
	};
	
	this.viewjob = function(action, label, callback) {
		this.gaEvent('Viewjob', action, label, null, callback);
	};

	this.applyjob = function(action, label, callback) {
		this.gaEvent('Applyjob', action, label, null, callback);
	};

	this.navigate = function(action, label, callback) {
		this.gaEvent('Navigate', action, label, null, callback);
	};

	this.newSearch = function(action, label, callback) {
		this.gaEvent('NewSearch', action, label, null, callback);
	};

	this.profile = function(action, label, callback) {
		this.gaEvent('Profile', action, label, null, callback);
	};

	this.facet = function(action, label, callback) {
		this.gaEvent('Facet', action, label, null, callback);
	};

	this.suggestedKW = function(kw, callback) {
		this.gaEvent('SuggestedKW', kw, null, null, callback);
	};

	this.postJob = function(action, label, callback) {
		this.gaEvent('PostJob', action, label, null, callback);
	};
	
	this.jobsFound = function() {
		this.gaEvent('use', 'search results', 'results found', null, null);
	};

	this.jobsNotFound = function() {
		this.gaEvent('use', 'search results', 'no results found', null, null);
	};
}

window._gae = new GAEventCaller();

if (window.$) {
	$(document).ready(function() {
		var mapPageView = {
				'a.next-page' : 'Next',
				'a.nextbutton' : 'Next',
				'.next-container a' : 'Next',
				'.show-more a' : 'Next',
				'a.last-page' : 'Back',
				'a.prevbutton' : 'Back',
				'a[href="/"]' : 'Home',
				'a[href="/jobsearch.match/emailmanagement.php"]' : 'Manage Email',
				'a[href="/landing/jobsearch.match/emailmanagement.php"]' : 'Manage Email',
				'a[href="/emailmanagement.php"]' : 'Manage Email',
				'a[href="/education/"]' : 'Education',
				'a[href="/page/contacts"]' : 'Feedback',
				'a[href="/page/about.html"]' : 'About',
				'a[href="/misc/privacy.html"]' : 'Privacy',
				'a[href="/landing/misc/privacy.html"]' : 'Privacy',
				'a[href="/misc/terms.html"]' : 'Terms',
				'a[href="/landing/misc/terms.html"]' : 'Terms',
				'a[href="/browse-jobs/"]' : 'Browse Jobs',
				'a[href="/postajob/"]' : 'Post Job',
				'a[href="/profile/"]' : 'Profile'
		};
		
		if (window._gae) {
			for(var selector in mapPageView) {
				$(selector).click(function(page) {
					return function() {
						var url = $(this).attr('href');
						_gae.navigate(page, url, function() {window.location = url;});
						return false;
					}
				}(mapPageView[selector]));
			}
			
			$('a.facet-link').click(function() {
				var url = $(this).attr('href');
				var key = $(this).attr('data-facet-key');
				var value = $(this).attr('data-facet-value');
				_gae.facet(value, key, function() {window.location = url;});
				return false;
			});
			
			$('a.sgstdkw').click(function() {
				var url = $(this).attr('href');
				var kw = $(this).attr('kw');
				_gae.suggestedKW(kw, function() {window.location = url;});
				return false;
			});			
		}
	});
}
</script>

<title>JobAppMatch</title>

<style type="text/css">

	html, body {margin: 0; padding: 0; font-size: 13px;}
	body {font-family: proxima-nova,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;}
	
	a {color: #6aa0d6;}
	a.n {text-decoration: none;}
	a.n:HOVER {text-decoration: underline;}
	
	#header {
		background: url(/index/new/imgs/jobappmatch.png) no-repeat 10px 10px;
		background-size: 150px auto;
		background-color: #ebecec;
		padding: 10px;
		position: relative;
	}
	
	#header a.login {display: block; float: right; background: #5b90cb; text-decoration: none; color: #fff; border: solid 1px #3264af; border-radius: 5px; padding: 7px 30px; font-weight: bold;}
	#header a.login:HOVER {background: #3264af;}
	#header a.hidden {display: none;}
	#header .form-login-container {float: right; display: none; position: relative; }
	#header .form-login-container .loader {display: none; position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: url(/shared/images/ajax-loader-2.gif) no-repeat center center; background-color: #eee; opacity: 0.5;}
	#header .form-login-container.loading .loader {display: block;}
	#header .form-login-container .control {margin-bottom: 2px; border: solid 1px #949494; background: #fff; overflow: hidden;}
	#header .form-login-container .control input {border: none; padding: 5px 10px; width: 90%;}
	#header .form-login-container .control input.error {background: #d00; color: #fff;}
	#header .form-login-container input[name="username"] {display: none;}
	#header .form-login-container .button {background: #5b90cb; border: solid 1px #3264af; border-radius: 5px; text-align: center;}
	#header .form-login-container .button:HOVER {background: #3264af;}
	#header .form-login-container .button button {padding: 7px 0; width: 100%; background: none; border: none; color: #fff; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; }

	.centered {max-width: 400px; margin: 0 auto;}
	.centered .centered-wrapper {margin: 0 10px;}
	.centered .centered-wrapper.left-one {margin-left: 60px;}

	.job-stats {text-align: left; padding: 20px 0; color: #aaa; font-size: 19px;}

	.form-search-container .control input {padding: 10px 0 10px 40px; width: 100%; border: none; font-size: 17px;}

	}

	.form-search-container .advanced-link {font-size: 17px; margin: 10px 0;}

	.footer .links a {color: #aaa;}

				<input name="CSRFToken" type="hidden" value="727717c7d0e5f400b0cf0ed82193b0d9"/>

<script type="text/javascript">

	function validateEmail(email) {
		var reg = /^([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.])+\@([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.])+\.([A-Za-z]{2,4})$/;
		return (reg.test(email) !== false);
	}
	
	function applyKWStripOut() {
		$('input[name="kw"]').val(doReplace($('input[name="kw"]').val()));
		$('input[name="loc"]').val(doReplace($('input[name="loc"]').val()));
		
		function doReplace(inval) {
			var val = inval;
			val = val.replace(/\b[A-Za-z0-9_\-\.]+\@[A-Za-z0-9_\-\.]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,5}\b/g, '');
			val = val.replace(/@/g, '');
			val = val.replace(/\bgmail\b/ig, '');
			val = val.replace(/\bhotmail\b/ig, '');
			val = val.replace(/\byahoo\b/ig, '');
			val = val.replace(/\.com\b/ig, '');
			val = val.replace(/\s+/g, ' ');
			val = val.replace(/\s+$/g, '');
			val = val.replace(/^\s+/g, '');
			return val;
		}
		
		$('input[name="kw"], input[name="loc"]').change(function() {
			var val = $(this).val();
			$(this).val(doReplace(val));
		});

		$('.form-search-container form').submit(function() {
			var kw = doReplace($('input[name="kw"]').val());
			var loc = doReplace($('input[name="loc"]').val());
			$('input[name="kw"]').val(kw);
			$('input[name="loc"]').val(loc);
			
			$.cookie("s_kw", kw, {expires: 2000, path: '/'});
			$.cookie("s_loc", loc, {expires: 2000, path: '/'});

			if (window._gae) {
				_gae.newSearch(kw, loc, function() {window.location = '/jobs.htm';});
			} else {
				window.location = '/jobs.htm';
			}
			
			return false;
		});
	}

	$(document).ready(function() {
		applyKWStripOut();
		
		$('#header .login').click(function() {
			$(this).toggleClass('hidden');
			$('#header .form-login-container').slideToggle();
			return false;
		});

		$('.form-search-container .control input[name="kw"]').focus(function() {
			$('.form-search-container .hidden').slideDown();
		});

		$('.form-login-container form').submit(function() {
			$(this).find('input').removeClass('error');
			
			var isValid = true;
			var email = $(this).find('input[name="email"]').val();
			var pass = $(this).find('input[name="pass"]').val();
			var username = $(this).find('input[name="username"]').val();

			if (!validateEmail(email)) {
				$(this).find('input[name="email"]').addClass('error');
				isValid = false;
			}

			if (!pass) {
				$(this).find('input[name="pass"]').addClass('error');
				isValid = false;
			}

			if (!isValid) {
				return false;
			}

			var data = {
					email: email,
					password: pass,
					username: username,
					CSRFToken : "727717c7d0e5f400b0cf0ed82193b0d9"			};

			$('.form-login-container').addClass('loading');
			
			$.post('/profile/login', data, function(ret) {
				var data = $.parseJSON(ret);
				
				if (data.success) {
					window.location = '/profile/done';
				} else {
					$('.form-login-container').removeClass('loading');
					if (data.error) {
						alert(data.error);
					}
				}
			});

			return false;
		});
	});

</script>

</body>
</html>
